Meeting on a "plastic free" future. appointment at the Liceo "Publio Virgilio Marone"
04 Nov 2019, 12:52 by Redazione

Where Liceo "Publio Virgilio Marone"
When From 05/11/2019 to 05/11/2019 üïó 10 am

Tuesday 5 November at 10 am in the Aula Magna of the Liceo Statale "Publio Virgilio Marone" in Avellino the students will discuss about the theme of art and ecology with the President of the Province of Avellino, Avv. Domenico Biancardi, the artist Emiliano Stella and the sole director of Irpiniambiente, Avv. Nicola Boccalone. The event opens, organized by the Relationship Manager with the territory Prof.ssa Barbara Matetich, the Director of the Liceo, dott.ssa Lucia Forino. The initiative aims to focus the attention of students and female students on the ban in the EU, by 2021, on the use of disposable plastic objects: cutlery, plates, straws, cotton buds, sticks for balloons, and the use of oxy-degradable plastics, food containers and expanded polystyrene cups. Dedicating particular attention to the problem of environmental impact, sustainability and ecology, which has become dramatically hot due to an actual situation that is perennially at risk, has become fundamental; educating the younger generations to respect the environment, which is essential. But how does it relate and how much do you feel and re-elaborate artistic research on this theme? These issues have involved the school community of the Virgilio Marone High School in Avellino: on Tuesday 5 November the students will try to propose their vision on environmental issues. School and local authorities working in the same direction!
